verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> earthly <S%G1919><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> of this tabernacle <S%G4636><s%> were dissolved <S%G2647><s%>, we have <S%G2192><s%> a building <S%G3619><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, an house <S%G3614><s%> not made with hands <S%G886><s%>, eternal <S%G166><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%>.

For <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> we groan <S%G4727><s%>, earnestly desiring <S%G1971><s%> to be clothed upon <S%G1902><s%> with our <S%G2257><s%> house <S%G3613><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>:
If <S%G1489><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> be that being clothed <S%G1746><s%> we shall <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%>.

For <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1063><s%> we that are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this tabernacle <S%G4636><s%> do groan <S%G4727><s%>, being burdened <S%G916><s%>: not <S%G3756><s%> for that <S%G1894><s%> we would <S%G2309><s%> be unclothed <S%G1562><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> clothed upon <S%G1902><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> mortality <S%G2349><s%> might be swallowed up <S%G2666><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> he that hath wrought <S%G2716><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the selfsame thing <S%G846><s%> <S%G5124><s%> is God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> the earnest <S%G728><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2532><s%> we are always <S%G3842><s%> confident <S%G2292><s%>, knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%>, whilst we are at home <S%G1736><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%>, we are absent <S%G1553><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>:

We are confident <S%G2292><s%>, I say, and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532><s%> willing <S%G2106><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> to be absent <S%G1553><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to be present <S%G1736><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> we labour <S%G5389><s%>, that <S%G2532><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> present <S%G1736><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> absent <S%G1553><s%>, we may be <S%G1511><s%> accepted <S%G2101><s%> of him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> appear <S%G5319><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the judgment seat <S%G968><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> every one <S%G1538><s%> may receive <S%G2865><s%> the things done in <S%G1223><s%> his body <S%G4983><s%>, according <S%G4314><s%> to that <S%G3739><s%> he hath done <S%G4238><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> it be good <S%G18><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> bad <S%G2556><s%>.

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the terror <S%G5401><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, we persuade <S%G3982><s%> men <S%G444><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> we are made manifest <S%G5319><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> I trust <S%G1679><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are made manifest <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> consciences <S%G4893><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we commend <S%G4921><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> to glory <S%G2745><s%> on <S%G5228><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> behalf <S%G5228><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may have <S%G2192><s%> somewhat to <S%G4314><s%> answer them which glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> appearance <S%G4383><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in heart <S%G2588><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> we be beside ourselves <S%G1839><s%>, it is to God <S%G2316><s%>: or whether <S%G1535><s%> we be sober <S%G4993><s%>, it is for your cause <S%G5213><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> constraineth <S%G4912><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>; because we thus <S%G5124><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, then <S%G686><s%> were <S%G599><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> dead <S%G599><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> that he died <S%G599><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they which live <S%G2198><s%> should <S%G2198><s%> not henceforth <S%G3371><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> unto themselves <S%G1438><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> unto him which died <S%G599><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> rose again <S%G1453><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> henceforth <S%G575><s%> <S%G3568><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>: yea <S%G1161><s%>, though <S%G1499><s%> we have known <S%G1097><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, yet <S%G235><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> henceforth <S%G3765><s%> know we <S%G1097><s%> him no more <S%G3765><s%>.

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> if any man <S%G1536><s%> be in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, he is a new <S%G2537><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%>: old things <S%G744><s%> are passed away <S%G3928><s%>; behold <S%G2400><s%>, all things <S%G3956><s%> are become <S%G1096><s%> new <S%G2537><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> hath reconciled <S%G2644><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> the ministry <S%G1248><s%> of reconciliation <S%G2643><s%>;

To wit <S%G5613><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, reconciling <S%G2644><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> unto himself <S%G1438><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> imputing <S%G3049><s%> their <S%G846><s%> trespasses <S%G3900><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> hath committed <S%G5087><s%> unto <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of reconciliation <S%G2643><s%>.

Now then <S%G3767><s%> we are ambassadors <S%G4243><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, as though <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> did beseech <S%G3870><s%> you by <S%G1223><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>: we pray <S%G1189><s%> you in <S%G5228><s%> Christ's <S%G5547><s%> stead <S%G5228><s%>, be ye reconciled <S%G2644><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he hath made <S%G4160><s%> him to be sin <S%G266><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> might be made <S%G1096><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
